positive.valid_data: when user input corect data then user got response 200

negative.wrong_serviceGroup: when user input data using invalid service group, then user got response error
negative.different_code: when user input data using different_code and with same service group and same name, then user got response error
negative.different_name: when user input data using different_name and with same service group and same code, then user got response error
